name: Master Userbot
description: Master Userbot Adalah Userbot Khusus Telegram Yang Menyediakan Beberapa Fitur Menarik

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Isilah alive name mu, bisa menggunakan username atau nama

ALIVE_PIC.description: Isi dengan link media telegraph, untuk alive.

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: Isi dengan link media telegraph untuk kustom gambar pmpermit.

CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.description: Masukan pm permit kustom, yang kamu mau.

PM_PERMIT_GROUP_ID.description: Isilah id grup mu sama dengan PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Wajib untuk plugin Pmpermit.

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Dapatkan api key mu dari https://www.remove.bg/ untuk cmd remove background

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Daftar akun di ocr.space untuk mendapatkan api key....

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Buatlah sebuah grup privasi tambahkan rose  lalu ketik /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL dan PRIVATE_GROUP_ID harus di isi sama

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: Buatlah sebuah channel channel lalu tambahkan rose ketik .get_id ,isilah disini untuk menvalue here for save messages

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Create a private group add rose bot then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: forlogin private messages create a private channel and do .get_id and add that id

STRING_SESSION.description: Dapatkan ini dari @Lorduserbot_group lalu masuk, ketik #string

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Pergi ke https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll kebawah dan tekan Reveal API.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the username of your bot

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time for autopic get from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

PM_DATA.description: ketik DISABLE jika anda mau to nonaktifkan pm permit...
